name: LED Tweaks
author: Brad Tipper

sections.installation:
1. Upload led-tweaks to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.7

  • Added function to filter/format URLs

1.0.6

  • Added CSS for Page Section Shortcode

1.0.5

  • Tweaked Page Section Shortcode

1.0.4

  • Added Page Section Shortcode

1.0.3

  • Added filter to remove prefixes from archive titles
  • Added one-use shortcode to display accurate title

1.0.2

  • Added admin only class

1.0.1

  • Added loggedin/loggedout classes
  • Added search form shortcode

1.0

  • Initial Release
sections.description: A suite of common customizations, shortcodes and tweaks for WordPress and Themeco’s Pro theme as used by Liquid Edge.

short_description: A suite of common customizations, shortcodes and tweaks for Wordpress and Themeco's Pro theme as used by Liquid Edge.
